traits.name: Archer's Eye (3/Day)
entries: As a bonus action, the archer can add {@dice 1d10} to its next attack or damage roll with a longbow or shortbow.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The archer makes two attacks with its longbow.

actions.name: Shortsword
entries: Melee atk +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Longbow
entries: Ranged atk +6 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4 damage) piercing damage.
